1156140.name: Vital Signs: ED - Injuries Package #1
1156140.description:
Continue your career in Vital Signs: Emergency Department with this downloadable content pack. Focus solely on the nine newly added injury and poisoning cases by trying the Injuries Cases #1 scenario that comes with this pack, or encounter them during the course of a random shift.

New patients included with this Injuries Package #1:

  • 36yo male s/p GSW to the abdomen

  • 12yo M with Ankle Injury

  • 8yo M with Arm Pain

  • 15yo F altered mental status

  • 32yo male s/p MCC. Helmeted. + LOC. Complaining of R neck pain and headache

  • 15yo F with Suicidal Ingestion attempt

  • 18yo F with Ankle Injury

  • 56yo male hit during football practice

  • 7yo M with Arm Pain
1156140.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
